function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Evaporation altering the trajectory of droplets, increasing transmission distance","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to longer transmission distance","Mitigation":"Use of technologies to monitor and control droplet evaporation, such as advanced ventilation systems and air distribution patterns","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air distribution patterns, computational fluid dynamics (CFD) techniques","People":"Occupants of confined spaces, public health","Owner":"Building owners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inaccurate assessment of air distribution effectiveness (Ez) in confined spaces","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of ventilation in preventing disease transmission","Mitigation":"Use of computational fluid dynamics (CFD) techniques to simulate and assess air distribution patterns, verification of ventilation effectiveness through monitoring and testing","Technologies":"Computational fluid dynamics (CFD) techniques, monitoring and testing equipment","People":"Occupants of confined spaces, public health","Owner":"Building owners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Use of modified Wells-Riley model for predicting infection risk","Impact":"Potential inaccuracies in infection risk prediction","Mitigation":"Validation of the modified model using real-world data and continuous refinement based on new information and insights","Technologies":"Real-world data collection and analysis, continuous refinement and updating of the model","People":"Public health authorities, epidemiologists","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
